answers.answer: about 12 pounds now just turned 24 weeks.Gained it all in the last 6 weeks too lol
I'm 22 weeks gained 6lbs having a boy Dec 27/28 they want me to gain 15 to 20 lbs total
I'm having a girl and have only gained 1 lb. I'm 22 wks
I am 24 weeks and have gained 10 pounds so far. I gained more than half of that in the past month. :/
Im 21+5 and i have gained 12 pounds
Tomorrow (Saturday) I'll be 23 weeks with a boy and I've only gained 7lbs
I am 23 weeks, normal BMI and have gained 12 lbs so far.
Sounds like everybody is gaining at a steady pace, I'm just worried I won't lose all my baby weight this time!
6 pounds so far! Im am 6 months today having a girl :)
24wks on monday and I gained 17 lbs so far.

I am a ftm, 21 weeks with a boy. I started out a little over weight and have gained less than a pound so far. My mom seems concerned.  But I was just at the doctor on Tuesday and baby looks good and the doctor didn't say anything about my weight.
I have lost 10 lbs and I am 25 weeks. I have gestational diabetes. The Dr. Say its OK because my eating habits have changed. The baby is healthy and growing just fine
25 weeks,  gained 12, my bmi was a bit high before getting pregnant.
I am 22 weeks and have gained 15 pounds. I have gained 10 of the 15 pounds within the last month so I have to watch what I eat now because my doctor only wants me to gain 10 more pounds.
Im 23 wks. So far ive gained 15 ish pounds. I started at 100 lol
I'm gaining fast. 25 weeks and 15 lbs :/This is my second and in always hungry! With my first, I didn't eat much. Both boys. Totally different pregnancies lol

question: I started out at a normal BMI, so far I've gained 10lbs and I'm 6 months pregnant with my daughter. When I was pregnant with my son I gained about 20lbs by the time I was 7 months. I think it's safe to say you're bigger when you carry a boy. Lol
title: How much weight have you gained?
